website_summaries.verdict: A sleek, powerful laptop that can handle intensive video editing with ease. Excellent display.
pros: Comes stacked with a 6-core Intel i7 processor and a 8MB cache
Engineered to store data needed for high-quality design purposes
Reviews cite this product's high-end design capability
Slim and lightweight, at just 2.9 pounds
cons: Some customers find the colors oversaturated

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this computer.
customer_reviews.text: So far all I can tell you is do not buy. My college student has had this computer for under a month and is having problems with it overheating. Very disappointed for the price of this laptop there should be no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: This Laptop is amazing so far. Sleek and beautiful. Solid build quality definitely feels high-end. Light and compact. Bright and clear screen resolution, speaker quality is decent , multiple backlit Keyboard lighting. No issues with overheating or hearing a fan no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: cnls

customer_reviews.title: Brand New laptop. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is just amazing!... Brand new. Excellent condition. Originally packed with all original seals. Laptop comes with pen. I am very satisfied. Although some people complain anD say that the laptop heat up very fast, I guess that happened because they oclude the vent output. Personally, I did not have that problem. I did not checked how long battery last, but easily around 4hs of continued movie streaming. I'll update this after one month. Very satisfied so far
customer_reviews.author: Luis Anibal

customer_reviews.title: Poor camera quality
customer_reviews.text: This is about the poorest camera quality I've had on a laptop. If you're buying this for webcam correspondence, you will not be satisfied. I had to buy a separate webcam to keep from being embarrassed in meetings, which I shouldn't have to do with a laptop of this quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Murry

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, nice and mobile
customer_reviews.text: Laptop is sleek and looks nice, totally mobile. Mine came with pen and original leather( faux) cover. Upper cover with screen is bendable 360 degrees so also available as a tablet. Only thing i didnt like when you use as a tablet , the keyboard is facing down and this is little bit discomforting.
customer_reviews.author: Onr

customer_reviews.title: Good Performance, Better Multitaasking, Sensitive and Qualitive Display, Amazing features
customer_reviews.text: Better performance than macbook pro 13, and the keyboard is amazing, so comfortable to use. Evereything is good but I wish, the speaker would be as good as MacBook Pro. Taking all into account, this device is amazing and probably the best in the price segment (also it's better in so many categories than MacBook Pro).
customer_reviews.author: Kanan Adilzada

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard is trash
customer_reviews.text: I love my older model HP x360 so I figured I'd by the new model for my wife. I didnt get far in preparing this PC because the keyboard is utter trash. Big step down from previous models. The 'L' key's click travel was defective. Checked the rest of the keys, and they seemed to be fine.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my nephew. He uses it for his tech studies.
customer_reviews.author: Yo-Yo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This 2-in-1 is amazing. Totally worth the price. I've had it for a couple of days and I haven't had any problems with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overheat and screen glitch
customer_reviews.text: Its lightweight laptop, confortable, very portable... But it has poor webcam resolution, it Overheat a lot! Poor audio volumen and quality, the screen glitch with Netflix or any HD video. I fill scam.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Rivadeneira

product_meta.title: HP Spectre x360-13.3" FHD Touch - 10gen i7-1065G7-8GB - 512GB SSD 32GB Optane - Silver
product_meta.description: HP Spectre x360 Convertible 2-in-1 Laptop: Improve your productivity on the go with this 13.3-inch Full HD HP Spectre x360 two-in-one notebook. The 512GB SSD with 32GB of Intel Optane memory ensures fast startups and loads frequently used programs in seconds. This ultra-thin, lightweight HP Spectre x360 two-in-one notebook has an Intel Core i7 processor and 8GB of RAM that smoothly run demanding tasks and let you multitask freely.
feature_bullets: Windows 10 Home, 13.3" inches 1920 x 1080 (Full HD) touch screen with HD-Built-In Webcam
10th Gen Intel Core i7-1065G7 1.3GHz 8MB Cache, Intel Iris Plus Graphics
2x USB 3.1 Type C Ports, 1x USB 3.1 Type A Ports, 2x Thunderbolt 3 Ports and 1x Headphone/microphone combo jack
Backlit Keyboard, Wireless-AX, Fingerprint reader, Weighs 2.87lbs, No Optical Drive.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars47 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
